Detailed Description

Class to provide buffers for communication of data.

MessageStream provides a message buffer that can hold data of any type. It is used by communication routines in the Schedule class.

TODO: Because this class supports both read and write modes, it has extra data and methods that don't make sense, depending on the mode. It should be rewritten as two classes, like std::cin and std::cout are. BTNG.

See also:
tbox::Schedule

Enumeration to identify if a buffer is being used to read or write data.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::MessageStream ( const size_t  bytes,
const StreamMode  mode,
const void *  data_to_read = NULL,
bool  deep_copy = true 
)

Create a message stream of the specified size and mode.

Parameters:
[in] bytes Number of bytes in the stream.
[in] mode MessageStream::Read or MessageStream::Write.
[in] data_to_read Data for unpacking, should be num_bytes bytes long. This is used when mode == MessageStream::Read, ignored in write mode.
[in] deep_copy Whether to make deep copy of data_to_read. The default is to make a deep copy, which is safer but slower than a shallow (pointer) copy. This is used when mode == MessageStream::Read, ignored in write mode. In shallow copy mode, you cannot call growBufferAsNeeded().

SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::MessageStream (  ) 

Default constructor creates a message stream with a buffer that automatically grows as needed, for writing.

SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::~MessageStream (  ) 

Destructor for a message stream.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename DATA_TYPE>
static unsigned int SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::getSizeof ( unsigned int  num_items = 1  )  [inline, static]

Static method to get amount of message stream space needed to communicate data type indicated by template parameter.

IMPORTANT: All size information given to the message stream should be based on values returned by this method.

TODO: Implementation should be moved out of header? If we do this, Then we need to create another implementation file to include in this header. I don't think it's worth it. RDH

Returns:
The number of bytes for num_items of type DATA_TYPE.
Parameters:
[in] num_items 

const void* SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::getBufferStart (  )  const [inline]

Return a pointer to the start of the message buffer.

size_t SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::getCurrentSize (  )  const [inline]

Return the current size of the buffer in bytes.

void SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::growBufferAsNeeded (  )  [inline]

Tell a Write-mode stream to allocate more buffer as needed for data.

It is an error to use this method for a Read-mode stream.

bool SAMRAI::tbox::MessageStream::endOfData (  )  const [inline]

Whether a Read-mode MessageStream has reached the end of its data.
